role_description: An Ansible role that installs youtube-dl, a command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other sites, on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [youtube-dl](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl) is an open-source download manager for video and audio from YouTube and over 1000 other video hosting websites. It is released under the Unlicense software license and is one of the most popular projects on GitHub.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs youtube-dl, a command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other sites, on nearly any platform.
